description: This course is targeted towards teaching people how to set up and use the basics of a computer effectively for either personal or basic business use in a practical manner. This course has been written in simple terms that anyone can understand. Our objective with this course is to help people with no or little computer knowledge get started. We know that having and using a computer in this day and age can make the lives of many much easier. If you want to learn at your own pace and in your own time in a very easy to understand format, then this is the course for you.
title: Setting up & Using a Computer Effectively
